import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, Button, Label, Col, Row, } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Control, LocalForm, Errors } from "react-redux-form"; const required = (val) => val && val.length; const maxLength = (len) => (val) => !val || val.length <= len; const minLength = (len) => (val) => val && val.length >= len; const isNumber = (val) => !isNaN(+val); const validEmail = (val) => /^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i.test(val); class Apply extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { firstName: "", lastName: "", phoneNum: "", email: "", agree: false, contactType: "By Phone", feedback: "", touched: { firstName: false, lastName: false, phoneNum: false, email: false, }, }; this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleSubmit(values) { console.log("Current state is: " + JSON.stringify(values)); alert("Current state is: " + JSON.stringify(values)); } render() { return (
Home Contact Us

Contact Us

Our Address
1 Nucamp Way
Seattle, WA 98001
U.S.A.
1-206-555-1234
campsites@nucamp.co

Send us your Feedback

this.handleSubmit(values)}>
); } } export default Apply;
